org.simulationsystems.csf.common.internal.messaging.interfaces.redis

Class RedisConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simulationsystems.csf.common.internal.messaging.interfaces.redis.RedisConnectionManager

  • public class RedisConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the CRUD operations to Redis. This class has no business-level knowledge.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Jorge Calderon

      • redisSynchronousPolling

        public java.lang.String redisSynchronousPolling(SYSTEM_TYPE requestingSystemType,
                                       java.lang.String redisKey,
                                       java.lang.Double sleepTime,
                                       java.lang.Long maximumNumberOfPolls)
        Redis synchronous polling.
        Parameters:
        requestingSystemType - the requesting system
        redisKey - the redis key
        sleepTime - the number of second to sleep
        maximumNumberOfPolls - the maximum number of polls on the Redis key. If null, this will poll forever.
        Returns:
        the string
